item.title: Javascript.com
item.description: This is a great website if you have never done any programming or javascript before. A super friendly and easy to use website.

item.title: Intro to JavaScript
item.description: Another good place to start with Javascript But goes into more detail and leads into more advanced areas.

item.title: Into to Jquery
item.description: Jquery is a powerful library build on JavaScript to make web development easy. You should be comfortable with JavaScript basics before starting this course. The course will explain JQuery to you so you don’t need any prior experience with it.

item.title: Codeschool.com
item.description: Similar to the Codecademy.com tutorials with no prior knowledge required. The site also has tutorials for libraries such as JQuery and React. A lot of the content is locked behind pay wall.

item.title: Request a Subject
item.description: This form will open up in GitHub to raise an issue with the provided information. If you would rather make the change yourself please open a pull request here. Subject Name Facebook Link GitHub Link Twitter Link Homepage Link Wikipedia Link Description

item.title: Request a Task
item.description: This form will open up in GitHub to raise an issue with the provided information. If you would rather make the change yourself please open a pull request here. Task Name Link Subject Select a Difficulty Easy Medium Hard Advanced Difficulty Select Tags Interactive Pay Wall Video Tags Description
